TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ChannelServices extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供帮助进行远程处理信道注册、解析和 URL 发现的静态方法。

span.span: Provides static methods to aid with remoting channel registration, resolution, and URL discovery.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序域、进程和计算机等的远程处理边界通道之间传输消息。Channels transport messages between applications across such remoting boundaries as application domains, processes, and computers. 这些交叉可以是入站和出站。These crossings can be inbound and outbound. 通道可以侦听入站消息的终结点、将其发送到出站消息的终结点或同时发送这两者。A channel can listen on an endpoint for inbound messages, send to an endpoint for outbound messages, or both. 这会在运行时中提供一个扩展点，用于插入各种协议，即使运行时可能不在通道的另一端也是如此。This provides an extensibility point in the runtime to plug in a wide range of protocols, even though the runtime might not be at the other end of the channel. 运行时对象可用于公开各种语义和实体。Run-time objects can be used to expose a wide range of semantics and entities. 通道提供用于将消息与特定协议相互转换的扩展点。The channel provides the extensibility point to convert the messages to and from the specific protocols. 通道必须公开 接口，该接口提供信息属性，例如 和 。Channels must expose the interface, which provides informational properties such as the and . 信道使用 方法进行注册。Channels are registered using the method. 还可从远程处理配置加载信道。Channels can also be loaded from the remoting configuration. （有关详细信息，请参阅[\<通道 > 元素（模板）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce) 。）(See [\ Element (Template)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce) for details.) 在客户端，消息遍历客户端 链后，它们将移交给客户端信道接收器链。On the client side, messages are handed off to the client channel sink chain after they traverse the client chain. 第一个信道接收器通常是一个 ，它将消息序列化为向下传递到客户端传输接收器的流。The first channel sink is typically a , which serializes the message into a stream that is passed down the channel sink chain to the client transport sink. 然后客户端传输接收器将此流写出到网络。The client transport sink then writes this stream out to the wire. 在服务器端，服务器传输接收器从网络读取请求，并将请求流传递到服务器信道接收器链。On the server side, the server transport sink reads requests off the wire and passes the request stream to the server channel sink chain. 此链末尾的服务器格式化程序接收器会将请求反序列化到消息中。The server formatter sink at the end of this chain will deserialize the request into a message. 然后，它会将此消息发送到远程处理基础结构，这会将其调度到服务器 链。It will then hand this message off to the remoting infrastructure, which will dispatch it to the server chain.

span.span: Application Domains

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use System.Runtime.Remoting.ChannelServices.RegisterChannel(IChannel chnl, bool ensureSecurity) instead.", false)

span.span: The channel to register.
Registers a channel with the channel services.
is obsolete.
Please use instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 已过时。 is obsolete. 请改用 。Please use instead. 方法采用通道对象的 接口。The method takes in the interface from a channel object. 通道的 必须是唯一的，否则通道必须是匿名的。The channel's must be unique, or the channel must be anonymous. 如果将 设置为使用 `name` 配置属性 `null` 或 ，则通道是匿名的。A channel is anonymous if the is set to either `null` or by using the `name` configuration property. 不能在 中注册两个具有相同名称的通道。You cannot register two channels with the same name in a . 默认情况下， 的名称为 "http"， 的名称为 "tcp"。By default, the name of a is "http" and the name of a is "tcp." 因此，如果要注册两个相同类型的通道，则必须通过配置属性为其中一个通道指定其他名称。Therefore, if you want to register two channels of the same type, you must specify a different name for one of them through configuration properties. 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅 和[\<频道 > 元素（模板）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see , and [\ Element (Template)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce). ## Examples [!code-cpp[HttpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpChannel/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpChannel/CS/server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpChannel/VB/server.vb#1)]

Registers a channel with the channel services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法接收来自通道对象的 接口。The method receives the interface from a channel object. 通道的 必须是唯一的，否则通道必须是匿名的。The channel's must be unique, or the channel must be anonymous. 如果将 设置为使用 `name` 配置属性 `null` 或 ，则通道是匿名的。A channel is anonymous if the is set to either `null` or by using the `name` configuration property. 不能在 中注册两个具有相同名称的通道。You cannot register two channels with the same name in a . 默认情况下， 的名称为 "http"， 的名称为 "tcp"。By default, the name of a is "http" and the name of a is "tcp". 因此，如果要注册两个相同类型的通道，则必须通过配置属性为其中一个通道指定其他名称。Therefore, if you want to register two channels of the same type, you must specify a different name for one of them through configuration properties. 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))和[\<通道 > 元素（模板）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)) and [\ Element (Template)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce). 如果 `ensureSecurity` 参数设置为 `true`，则远程处理系统将确定通道是否实现 ，如果是，则启用加密和数字签名。If the `ensureSecurity` parameter is set to `true`, the remoting system determines whether the channel implements , and if so, enables encryption and digital signatures. 如果通道未实现 ，则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if the channel does not implement . > [!NOTE] > 将 `ensureSecurity` 设置为 `true` 会对 Windows 98 上的 引发 ，因为 Windows 9x 上不支持安全 tcp 通道，并且对于所有平台上的 （如果要使用安全 http 通道，则必须在 IIS 中托管服务）。Setting `ensureSecurity` to `true` throws a for the on Windows 98 (Since secure tcp channels are not supported on Windows 9x), and for the on all platforms (You must host your service in IIS if you want to use a secure http channel).

exception.span: 如果需要安全的 HTTP 信道，请使用 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 承载服务。

span.span: Host the service using Internet Information Services (IIS) if you require a secure HTTP channel.
